ARTICLE.TITLE: Authorities seized student’s phone to gather evidence against instructor
ARTICLE.TEXT: This week, host Alycin Bektesh is joined by Public Information Officer Mike De Fries who is on scene in Glenwood Springs as one of nearly 900 fire crew working to contain the 29,000 acre Grizzly Creek Fire. De Fries gives the on the ground experience of the crews fighting the fire, and the b…
